title: Apple Blueberry Shortcake Pie
description: This shortcake pie is full of surprises - dig through a golden crust to apples and blueberries, oven-warmed and oozing sweet juice

title: Rum and Raisin Baked Apples
description: Glowing Jazz apples are the star ingredient of this winter warming dessert

title: Oat Apple Crisp
description: This is the best dessert for the early fall when the sweet and firm apples are just in season

title: Dutch Apple Cake
description: This is another great cake for the fall. When apples are plentiful and delicious there are so many ways to thank mother nature for its bounty

title: Apple Pie
description: This is the best recipe for apple pie for those who want an old-fashioned, perfect tasting apple pie with a flaky crust
